p: The BC pellicles impregnated with EOs were placed onto the surface of the Mueller-Hinton (M-H) agar medium (BioMaxima, Poland) seeded with the suspension of S. aureus and P. areuginosa at a density of 1.5 × 10 8 CFU/mL. Then, the cultures were carried out for 24 h at 37 °C. The average diameters of the inhibition zone (in mm) were calculated for each tested sample. The tests were performed in triplicate.
